argumentText:
ARGUMENT
x y z

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_df-oadd | |- +o = ( x e. On , y e. On |-> ( rec ( ( z e. _V |-> suc z ) , x ) ` y ) ) |
| 2 |  | #P_vex | |- y e. _V |
| 3 |  | #P_vex | |- x e. _V |
| 4 |  | #P_oafnex | |- ( z e. _V |-> suc z ) Fn _V |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_rdgexg | |- ( y e. _V -> ( rec ( ( z e. _V |-> suc z ) , x ) ` y ) e. _V ) |
| 6 | 2, 5 | #P_ax-mp | |- ( rec ( ( z e. _V |-> suc z ) , x ) ` y ) e. _V |
| 7 | 1, 6 | #P_fnmpt2i | |- +o Fn ( On X. On ) |
